game.name: Aquatic Store Simulator
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 수중 테마의 슈퍼마켓을 직접 운영하세요! 이국적인 물고기와 장식으로 선반을 채우고, 가격을 정하고, 결제를 받고, 수족관을 관리하세요. 물고기를 배달하고, 거래를 처리하고, 고객이 만족하도록 하세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Dive into the vibrant world of aquatic retail with Aquatic Store Simulator! Take on the challenge of managing your underwater-themed supermarket, blending business management with the beauty of marine life. Stock shelves with exotic fish, decorations, set prices, take payments and maintain aquariums

reviewHighlights.text: Really cool game so far and I like the level of detail I can get in the tanks. The only improvements I would say this game need at this point is to ad...
